DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the potential effect of multiple doses of neratinib on the pharmacokinetics (how the body absorbs, distributes, metabolizes and/or excretes) of a single dose of digoxin.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Potential Effect Of Multiple Doses Of Neratinib On The Pharmacokinetics Of A Single Dose Of Digoxin
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Healthy men and women of nonchildbearing potential, age 1850
